metadata.Title: CVE-2021-33656 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: When setting font with malicous data by ioctl cmd PIO_FONT,kernel willwrite memory out of bounds.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
